description: A representation of an eBay auction item.
title: Item

AutoPay.description: If the seller requires immediate payment.

AvailableForPickupDropOff.description: Pickup an item from an eBay collection center.

BestOfferEnabled.description: If the seller accepts the best offer.

BidCount.description: The number of bids placed on the auction.

BuyItNowAvailable.description: If Buy It Now is available on the auction.

BuyItNowPrice_value.description: The Buy It Now price (only present if BuyItNowAvailable).

BuyItNowPrice_currencyID.description: The Buy It Now currency ID (only present if BuyItNowAvailable).

Charity_CharityID.description: A number to identify an associated chartiy.

Charity_DonationPercent.description: The percentage of purchase price towards charity.

Charity_LogoURL.description: The full URL to the charity logo.

Charity_Mission.description: The stated mission point of the chartiy.

ConditionDescription.description: A description of the item condition.

ConditionDisplayName.description: User-friendly name for the item condition.

ConditionID.description: Numeric identifier that represents the condition of the item.

ConvertedBuyItNowPrice_value.description: The Buy It Now price (only present if BuyItNowAvailable).

ConvertedBuyItNowPrice_currencyID.description: The Buy It Now currency ID (only present if BuyItNowAvailable).

ConvertedCurrentPrice_currencyID.description: The current, converted auction proce currency ID.

Country.description: Two letter country code of where the item is from.

CurrentPrice_currencyID.description: The current auction price currency ID.

Description.description: The seller's description of the listing.

EligibleForPickupDropOff.description: If the item can be picked up or dropped off.

EndTime.description: The time (in ISO8601) that the auction ends.

ExcludeShipToLocation.description: Countries the seller will not ship to.

GalleryURL.description: A URL link to a thumbnail of the gallery image.

GlobalShipping.description: If the seller ships the item globally.

HandlingTime.description: The maximum number of days an item takes to ship.

HighBidder_UserID.description: The unique ID of the highest bidder.

HighBidder_FeedbackPrivate.description: If the highest bidder has feedback history set to private.

HighBidder_FeedbackRatingStar.description: A color representing the highest bidders feedback star image.

HighBidder_FeedbackScore.description: The aggregate feedback score for the highest bidder.

HighBidder_UserAnonymized.description: If eBay has annonymized the highest bidder information.

HitCount.description: The number of times the item auction page has be visited.

IntegratedMerchantCreditCardEnabled.description: If the seller can accept common credit cards as payment.

ItemID.description: The unique identifier of the eBay listing.

ListingStatus.description: The status of the item auction.

ListingType.description: The type of auction that is being run for the item.

Location.description: The physical location of the item.

LotSize.description: The number of items being sold in the auction.

MinimumToBid_value.description: The minimum bid price on the item auction.

MinimumToBid_currencyID.description: The currency ID of the minimum bid price on the item auction.

PaymentAllowedSite.description: The locations which payments can be accepted from.

PaymentMethods.description: The locations which payments can be accepted from.

PictureURL.description: An array (list) of URLs of item gallery images.

PostalCode.description: The postal code (zip code) of the item's physical location.

PrimaryCategoryID.description: The unique identifier of the eBay listing's primay category.

PrimaryCategoryIDPath.description: The full path to the primary listing category.

PrimaryCategoryName.description: The full name of the primary listing category.

Quantity.description: The quantity of the item available for purchase.

QuantityAvailableHint.description: The quantity of the item available for purchase (hinted).

QuantitySoldByPickupInStore.description: The number of item sold through the In-Store Pickup option.

QuantityThreshold.description: The threshold for the quanity available hinted.

ReserveMet.description: If the auction reserve has been met.

ReturnPolicy_Description.description: Sellers description of their return policy.

ReturnPolicy_InternationalRefund.description: Sellers description if compensates international buyers for remorse returns.

ReturnPolicy_InternationalReturnsAccepte.description: The sellers return policy (even if not shipping internationally).

ReturnPolicy_InternationalReturnsWithin.description: The number of days a buyer can return the item in.

ReturnPolicy_InternationalShippingCostPa.description: Indicates if buyer or seller pays the shipping cost.

ReturnPolicy_Refund.description: Sellers description if compensates domestic buyers for remorse returns.

ReturnPolicy_ReturnsWithin.description: The number of days a buyer can return the item in.

ReturnPolicy_ShippingCostPaidBy.description: Indicates if buyer or seller pays the shipping cost.

SecondaryCategoryID.description: The unique identifier of the eBay listing's secondary category.

SecondaryCategoryIDPath.description: The full path to the secondary listing category.

SecondaryCategoryName.description: The full name to the secondary listing category.

Seller_FeedbackRatingStar.description: A color representing the highest bidders feedback star image.

Seller_FeedbackScore.description: The aggregated feedback score for the seller.

Seller_PositiveFeedbackPercent.description: The percentage value of a sellers feedback.

Seller_TopRatedSeller.description: If the seller has Top-Rated Seller status

Seller_UserID.description: The unique identifier of the eBay seller.

Site.description: The eBay marketplace on which the item was originally listed.

StartTime.description: The time (in ISO8601) that the auction started.

Storefront_StoreName.description: The name of the sellers eBay store.

Storefront_StoreURL.description: The URL of the sellers eBay store.

TimeLeft.description: The time left (in ISO8601) before the listing is scheduled to end.

ViewItemURLForNaturalSearch.description: The URL to the listing's View Item page on the eBay marketplace.
